channel.title: A level 126 can attk a lvl 101 at lvl 1 wildy?
channel.description: how do i fix the level system of wildy? im using hybrid pvp, and idk whatta do.

item.title: A level 126 can attk a lvl 101 at lvl 1 wildy?
item.dc:creator: @zach55200 zach55200
item.description:
@zach55200 wrote:

You can edit this in your config.

go to config.java and search for this

public static final boolean COMBAT_LEVEL_DIFFERENCE

Make that statement true.

Read full topic
item.source: A level 126 can attk a lvl 101 at lvl 1 wildy?

item.title: A level 126 can attk a lvl 101 at lvl 1 wildy?
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

[quote=“razorback, post:3, topic:422258”]Simple fix.

if ((targetLevel >= playerLevel + wildyLevel) || (targetLevel <= playerLevel - wildylevel)) {
sendMessage(“Can’t attack”);
} else {
attack();
}

You’ll need a statement like that. Obviously your variables and methods will be different. But that is a template to enforce wildyLevels.[/quote]
and where exactly would i place this?

Read full topic
item.source: A level 126 can attk a lvl 101 at lvl 1 wildy?

item.title: A level 126 can attk a lvl 101 at lvl 1 wildy?
item.dc:creator: @razorback razorback
item.description:
@razorback wrote:

Simple fix.

if ((targetLevel >= playerLevel + wildyLevel) || (targetLevel <= playerLevel - wildylevel)) {
sendMessage(“Can’t attack”);
} else {
attack();
}

You’ll need a statement like that. Obviously your variables and methods will be different. But that is a template to enforce wildyLevels.

Read full topic
